summary: A stand alone retexture of female Nightingale armor and a new bow highly inspired by Robin of Locksly.
descriptionHtml:
Well, got bored today and figured I would try out my hand in modding. It\\\'s addicting suffice it to say. 

Here\\\'s my first ever mod and because I lack the creative touch I decided on a \\\"Robin Hood\\\" theme, partly due to the fact that I just finished watching it :/ This is a stand alone retexture of the female  Nightingale that is craftable, temperable and enchantable and have different values from vanilla. I removed the cape because lets face it, it was horrible. 

The bow is a retexture of the longbow, only seemed appropriate, that is as well craftable and enchantable and has a higher damage value. 

Install via NMM or extract contents into data folder.

Crafting
    Bow
        Forge >> Iron >> Robyn\\\'s Long Bow
    Armor
        Forge >> Misc >> Arrow Boots/Arrow Hood/Arrow Gloves/Arrow Curiass
    New hood
        Forge >> Misc >> Robyns Hood

UPDATE...... 
v3 - Noticed there was a tempeing issue with the armor so that is fixed, added a NEW hood for a better feel and recolored the bow to a cherry-like stain.

v2 - Fixed the first person texture to use the Robyn one. Forgot all about it.
author: n1x4
